content: this is a listing for a crochet baby cardigan pattern- boho baby > **free pattern ** this pattern is also available on my **blog** 1 and my > **youtube** 2 channel for free i make > almost all my patterns available in > printable pdf format for a small > convenience fee the fee compensates > the ad revenue i would make if you had > to visit the site to access the > instructions plus most of my pdf > files include additional sizes this > one as well > buy 3 patterns or more and get 20% off > on the entire purchase no coupon is > needed happy crocheting **my boho collection of patterns ** crochet sandals https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/boho-baby-sandals crochet blanket https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/classic-granny-square-baby-blanket crochet bonnet https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/boho-baby-bonnet **sizes ** 0 - 6 months chest 48 cm 19 1/4 length 24 cm 9 1/2 6 - 12 months chest 55 cm 21 1/2 length 30 cm 11 3/4 **materials ** **yarn ** aran weight cotton yarn rico creative cotton aran in the shade nature 60 - 2 skeins for 0 - 6 and 3 skeins for 6 - 12 months dk weight cotton yarn paintbox yarns cotton dk - washed teal 433 daffodil yellow 422 and bright peach 412 - a small amount of each color **crochet hook ** 4 0 mm or g/6 crochet hook **you will also need ** scissors tapestry needle stitch markers **stitches ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet **number of pages in pdf ** 4 **in the pdf ** written instructions step-by-step photo tutorial and video tutorial **language ** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy **please note ** the written instructions for this pattern can also be found on my blog croby patterns https //crobypatterns com/ and my youtube channel however in the smallest size only the price is for the pattern/tutorial/pdf only not the finished product *************************************************************************** > **coupon codes ** enter the code threeormore to get 20% off on entire > purchase if you buy 3 patterns of > more make sure the code is accepted > before you pay i will not be able to > refund the difference *************************************************************************** this pattern is the property of croby patterns and is for your personal use only you can not modify sell or share this pattern you can sell finished items made from this pattern but please clearly credit the design to me croby patterns please provide a link to my blog crobypatterns com 1 https //crobypatterns com/crochet-boho-baby-cardigan/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=5j23c7yq3wc
